game.name: Rockbot
game.desc: A game freely inspired by old classic 8-bit jump-and-shoot games style, with some modern here and there. Rockbot and RockDroid were created by Upperlands and were inspired by the old NES MegaMan games.

game.name: RockDroid
game.desc: A game freely inspired by old classic 8-bit jump-and-shoot games style, with some modern here and there. Rockbot and RockDroid were created by Upperlands and were inspired by the old NES MegaMan games.
